did.head: Descriptive Sumamry
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. Faculty Senate.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from Faculty Senate Records must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Faculty Senate Records, RG 30/3, Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Processing, arrangement, and description of the Faculty Senate Records was completed prior to 2010. Additional description was completed in 2010 when the existing HTML inventory was converted to a finding aid.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: The Faculty Senate was formed in 1969 by approval of the Board of Visitors to "articulate faculty views on campus policies and procedures." For more information on the Faculty Senate, including meeting minutes from 2003-present, see: http://www.facultysenate.vt.edu/.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The minutes of the Faculty Senate, 1969 to 1990, make up the core of this collection. The minutes and reports of the Faculty Senate Steering Committee, 1967-69, also are included in this collection. Other materials, 1966-80, include: annual reports of the Senate presidents, cabinet minutes, constitutions and bylaws, correspondence, memoranda, minutes and reports of various committees and subcommittees, reports, and Senate rosters. Also included are scattered minutes and other materials dealing with the Commission on Faculty Affairs, Commission on Research and Graduate Studies, Commission on Student Affairs, Commission on Undergraduate Studies, Student Government Association, and University Council.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is arranged chronologically by year, then alphabetically by subject files.
